column1: Savi is a successful woman, pushing to become partner at her law firm while copng with a changing domestic situation. Her sister, Josslyn, depends on Savi as a bulwark -- when Josslyn is between parties and dating. The two share a best friend, April, a mother of two who recently lost her husband and wants to rebuild her life. The group rounds out with Karen, a therapist who reconnects with them after a relationship with a patient got out of hand. The four girlfriends rely on one another for support, as each faces her own issues.
